Package com.cafean.config.site

Class AbstractSiteConfigLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.config.site.AbstractSiteConfigLoader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultSiteConfigLoader
    public abstract class AbstractSiteConfigLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class loads the contents of the global and user site configuration files and provides accessors for the loaded data.

      boolean checkPersonal()

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractSiteConfigLoader

        public AbstractSiteConfigLoader​(Configurator config)
        Creates a new site configuration loader.

    • Method Detail

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Disposes of any resources held by this configuration loader. This base implementation clears the application and platform lookup tables.

      • reload

        public void reload()
        discards the current platform definition set and re-reads all of the selected site configuration files

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Reads the site-wide and user-level site configuration files

      • checkPersonal

        public boolean checkPersonal()
        Reloads the available site configuration settings if the current user's personal settings (~/.snap/site_config.xml) have been modified since the last time they were loaded.

      • readProperties

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> readProperties()
                                                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the given site configuration properties file. Properties in this file are in the form: [name]=[value]

        Empty lines and those that begin with pound(#) or exclamation(!) are considered comments and ignored.

        Returns:
        a Map<String,String> containing the properties read from the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - for errors during the read process

      • readProperties

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> readProperties​(java.io.File propFile)
                                                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the given site configuration properties file. Properties in this file are in the form: [name]=[value]

        Empty lines and those that begin with pound(#) or exclamation(!) are considered comments and ignored.

        Parameters:
        propFile - a File referring to the site configuration properties file
        Returns:
        a Map<String,String> containing the properties read from the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - for errors during the read process

      • getPlatforms

        public java.util.List<PlatformDefinition> getPlatforms()
        returns the list of platforms loaded by this site config loader

      • findPlatform

        public PlatformDefinition findPlatform​(java.lang.String platformPath)
        Returns the platform definition with the given name.

        ([site]: [name])

        Parameters:
        platformPath - a String containing the site and name of the desired platform in the form returned by PlatformDefinition.getPlatformPath().
        Returns:
        the PlatformDefinition with the given name or null if none is found.

      • createLocalPlatform

        public static PlatformDefinition createLocalPlatform​(java.io.File cafeanHome,
                                                     Configurator config)
        Creates a PlatformDefinition describing the implicit "Local" platform.
        Parameters:
        cafeanHome - a File referring to the CAFEAN_HOME folder as given by Configurator.getCafeanHome()
        config - the Configurator to use to load root folders
        Returns:
        a PlatformDefinition that describes the local calculation server.

      • getApplications

        public java.util.List<ApplicationDefinition> getApplications​(java.lang.String appType,
                                                             java.lang.String platformPath)
        Retrieves the list of ApplicationDefinitions with the given type located on the given platform.
        Parameters:
        appType - a String containing the type of applications desired as returned from ApplicationDefinition.getType().
        platformPath - a String containing the platform path as returned by PlatformDefinition.getPlatformPath()
        Returns:
        a List<ApplicationDefinition> containing the loaded application definitions.

      • getApplications

        public java.util.List<ApplicationDefinition> getApplications()
        Retrieves the list of ApplicationDefinitions.
        Returns:
        a List containing the loaded application definitions.

      • getApplicationsByGroup

        public java.util.List<ApplicationDefinition> getApplicationsByGroup​(java.lang.String groupName)
        Retrieves the list of ApplicationDefinitions retrieved from the given group.
        Parameters:
        groupName - a String containing the desired group folder or standard group name such as GROUP_ALL above.
        Returns:
        a List containing the loaded application definitions.

      • getGroupList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getGroupList()
        Returns a list of the groups loaded from site configuration with the exception of the global and personal implicit groups. The GROUP_ALL, GROUP_GLOBAL and GROUP_PERSONAL defines should be used for the names of the implicit groups.
        Returns:
        a List of Strings with each string containing a single group name.

      • getAllGroupsList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllGroupsList()
        Returns a list of the groups loaded from site configuration including the global and personal implicit groups. The GROUP_ALL, GROUP_GLOBAL and GROUP_PERSONAL defines should be used for the names of the implicit groups.
        Returns:
        a List of Strings with each string containing a single group name.

      • findApplication

        public ApplicationDefinition findApplication​(java.lang.String applicationPath,
                                             java.lang.String platformPath)
        Retrieves the application with the given name located on the given platform.
        Parameters:
        applicationPath - a String containing the path of the application
        platformPath - a String containing the platform ID as returned by PlatformDefinition.getPlatformPath()
        Returns:
        the ApplicationDefinition requested or null if it is not found

      • getDefaultApplication

        public ApplicationDefinition getDefaultApplication​(java.lang.String appType,
                                                   java.lang.String platformPath)
        Returns the ApplicationDefinition that is the default for the given type on the given platform. The default is either the *only* application definition of that type on that platform or the definition selected by the user as the default.
        Parameters:
        appType - a String containing the application type
        platformPath - a String containing the site and name of the desired platform in the form returned by PlatformDefinition.getPlatformPath().
        Returns:
        the ApplicationDefinition that is the default for the given type on the given platform.
        See Also:
        ApplicationDefinition.getApplicationPath(), PlatformDefinition.getPlatformPath()
